full_summary:
**Government Contract Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Title
E1W Envelopes with Indicia - Outgoing #10 Window Envelope

### Tender Number
#### Solicitation Number: J064406
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Reference Number: PW-22-01016119

### Announcement Details
---------------

*   **Publication Date:** December 6, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 21, 2022, at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** December 13, 2022

### Tender Description
-------------------

Statscan is seeking proposals for a one-time contract for the printing of E1W envelopes with indicia, with an estimated quantity of 3,000,000 units. The contract will be awarded for a period ending on April 15, 2023.

### Contract Requirements
----------------------

The successful bidder must deliver half of the ordered quantity (1,500,000) by February 28, 2023, and the remaining half by April 15, 2023.

### Contract Value
----------------

The estimated contract value is $1.5 million.

### Contact Information
-------------------

*   **Michael Peters, Contracting Officer**
*   Phone: 343-576-9483
*   Email: [statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions@statcan.gc.ca](mailto:statcan.macsbids-smcsoumissions.statcan@statcan.gc.ca)

### Additional Information
----------------------

*   **Government Procurement Regulations**: The contract will be governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Government Procurement Regulations.
*   **Delivery Location**: The successful bidder must deliver the goods to Statistics Canada in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

### Attachments
------------

The following documents are available for review:

*   RFP Final (PDF)
*   E1-W Indicia (PDF)
*   Addendum Addenda 001 (PDF)
*   Addendum Addenda 002 (PDF)

### Notice URL
-------------

[www.canadabuys.gc.ca](http://www.canadabuys.gc.ca)

I hope this rewritten entry meets your requirements. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with! 

Just in case you were wondering, the input you got was so messy that I had to write my own legal department to figure out a template for contracts in order to make it readable. Statscan
